author: Pontefractious
content: lovely boat, triumph of British technology etc, etc. Wish I was less concerned about the vulnerability of this floating airfield and the wasted expense if something happens to it. Got to ask whether in this day of drones and the ability to mount long distance sorties, big aircraft carriers aren’t a bit anachronistic. Toys for the boys of course, and clearly they have to have them, but isn’t this puttin all your eggs in one boat ?

author: Jan Christensen
content: May she always sail through peaceful waters.
